content: Create a JanusXR room with a simple space scene. We'll start with a blank room, with an assetimage named "stars" pointing to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jbaicoianu/elation-component-space/refs/heads/master/images/galaxy_starfield.png and <room skybox_equi="stars">

Created a new JanusXR room with a simple space scene. Added an `assetimage` named "stars" pointing to the specified URL and set the room's skybox accordingly. Let me know if you'd like to add any other elements or make further customizations.
